name: Tiffany & Co. Return to Tiffany Heart Tag Necklace
description: Iconic heart tag pendant in sterling silver on a chain. Features the classic 'Return to Tiffany' engraving.
care_instructions: Clean with silver polish. Store in anti-tarnish pouch.
story: The Return to Tiffany collection was inspired by the key rings first created in 1969.
meta_title: Tiffany Heart Tag Necklace - Sterling Silver Jewelry
meta_description: Classic Tiffany & Co. heart tag necklace in sterling silver with adjustable chain

name: Cartier Love Bracelet
description: Iconic Love bracelet in 18k yellow gold with screw motifs. Comes with signature screwdriver.
care_instructions: Professional cleaning recommended. Store in original box.
story: Created in 1969, the Love bracelet symbolizes unbreakable love and commitment.
meta_description: Legendary Cartier Love bracelet in 18k yellow gold with signature screw design

name: Van Cleef & Arpels Alhambra Necklace
description: Vintage Alhambra necklace with mother-of-pearl motifs in yellow gold. Features 10 four-leaf clover motifs.
care_instructions: Handle with care. Professional cleaning advised.
story: The Alhambra collection, created in 1968, is inspired by the four-leaf clover symbol of luck.
meta_title: Van Cleef Alhambra Necklace - Mother-of-Pearl Gold Jewelry
meta_description: Elegant Van Cleef & Arpels Alhambra necklace with mother-of-pearl clovers

name: Bulgari B.zero1 Ring
description: Bold spiral ring in 18k rose gold inspired by the Colosseum. Features the iconic B.zero1 design.

meta_description: Iconic Bulgari B.zero1 ring in 18k rose gold with spiral design

name: Chopard Happy Diamonds Earrings
